Abdul Mannan Alhassan


He started his footballing career with Cape Twn FC

He had his basic education at Goldfieds School Complex, where he captained the school in Inter-Sch matches before continuing his studies in St. Marys Boys Secondary School.

Whie in St Mary's, he was elected Sports Prefect for his year group


He is a founding member of the Islamic Golden Eleven where he mostly feature as a central or attacking midfielder.

He enjoys playing FC25 Games at his leisure time.
